issues.title: Module Architecture Incomplete - PIT at 15.4% Completeness
issues.root_cause: Architecture documents not yet created for majority of required components
symptoms: Only 2 of 13 required architecture components present
Missing critical components: DATABASE_SCHEMA, INTEGRATION_SPEC, EDGE_FUNCTIONS
Build blocked due to insufficient architecture
diagnosis_steps_taken: Ran plan-build.py to assess module readiness
prevention_measures: Establish architecture-first approach before build waves
Require minimum 80% architecture completeness before planning
Create architecture component templates to accelerate creation
lessons_learned: Build orchestration requires complete architecture foundation
Module readiness assessment correctly prevents premature builds
Architecture gaps must be addressed before task generation
Build Wave 0 validation successfully identified blocker

issues.title: Test Environment Not Configured
issues.root_cause: Test environment infrastructure not yet set up for module builds
diagnosis_steps_taken: Reviewed test environment requirements in BUILD_ORCHESTRATION_READINESS.md
Confirmed no test infrastructure currently exists
Identified as prerequisite for Build Wave 1
prevention_measures: Set up test environment before Build Wave 1
lessons_learned: Test environment is prerequisite for actual builds
Build Wave 0 correctly identified environment gaps
Environment setup should parallel architecture completion

notes: Build Wave 0 successfully identified blockers without attempting code generation
All issues are expected findings for an orchestration dry-run
No actual failures occurred - system worked as designed
These issues provide clear roadmap for Build Wave 1 preparation
